question[question_text]:
Suppose you are using a linear SVM classifier with 2 class classification problem. Observe the following data in which labeled points represent support vectors (1-3).

What happens with the decision boundary in the following cases (select one correct answer)?
question[answers][0][answer_text]: Decision boundary will not change if you remove data point labeled with 1.
question[answers][1][answer_text]: Decision boundary will not change if you remove data point labeled with 2.
question[answers][2][answer_text]: Decision boundary will not change if you remove data point labeled with 3.
question[answers][3][answer_text]: The three examples are positioned such that removing any of them the decision boundary will change.
